titleStmt.title: A president for young pen-men. Or The letter-writer Containing letters of sundry sortes, with their seuerall answeres. Full of variety, delight, and pleasure, and most necessary for the instruction of those that can write, but haue not the guift of enditing.
titleStmt.author: M. R., fl. 1638.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G. Eld for Robert Wilson, and are to be sold at his shoppe at Grayes Inne Gate,
